description:
A boy the size of a thumb defeats a demon. A girl seeks shelter on a snowy night, but is forced to sleep under the porch. A pack of hungry wolves approach her.  The lord of a local province learns to love pike.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Issunboushi / Ookami Ishi / Meguro no Sanma
Little One Inch / The Wolf Rock / The Meguro Pike
一寸法師 / オオカミ石 / 目黒のさんま
